mapper.sql: id, no, zid, address, room, bath, size, year, type, name, city_name, street_name, county_name, state_name, price, description, desc_cn, area, carbarn, vr, property_fee, land_tax, monthly_rent, monthly_rent_trend, school, pics, created_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from resource
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into resource (id, no, zid, address, room, bath, size, year, type, name, city_name, street_name, county_name, state_name, price, description, desc_cn, area, carbarn, vr, property_fee, land_tax, monthly_rent, monthly_rent_trend, school, pics, created_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{zid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bath,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{streetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{carbarn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propertyFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{landTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monthlyRent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{monthlyRentTrend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pics,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update resource
no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
zid = #{zid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room = #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bath = #{bath,jdbcType=INTEGER},
size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
street_name = #{streetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county_name = #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state_name = #{stateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=BIGINT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc_cn = #{descCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
carbarn = #{carbarn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vr = #{vr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
property_fee = #{propertyFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
land_tax = #{landTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monthly_rent = #{monthlyRent,jdbcType=BIGINT},
monthly_rent_trend = #{monthlyRentTrend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pics = #{pics,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
